author: COMSOL
description: The model studies the oxidative dissolution of this noble metal in an air saturated cyanide solution. The system encompasses three phases: a gaseous phase (air), an aqueous phase, and a solid gold phase. The system is assumed to be homogeneous on a macroscopic scale, for example fine particulate matter dispersed in water, which is continuously agitated by a stream of air bubbles.
label: gold_recycling.mph
name: root

settings.description: Gold mass to liquid volume ratio
settings.name: loading_Au

settings.description: Henry's Law Constant for O2(g) in water
settings.name: H_O2

settings.description: Resulting initial concentration of oxygen in gas phase
settings.name: gas_c0_O2g

settings.description: Virtual concentration of gold atoms (s) as if dissolved in liquid phase
settings.name: liquid_c0_Au

settings.description: Initial diameter of spherical gold particles
settings.name: spherical_d0

settings.description: Initial surface to volume ratio of spherical particles
settings.name: spherical_S0_V0

settings.description: Surface rate of dissolution, Eq. 32 in Senanayake 2005
settings.name: Rs_Au

settings.description: Volumetric rate of dissolution, modulated by remaining surface area
settings.name: flakes_R_Au

nodes.author: COMSOL
nodes.displayLabel: 1: 4 Au(s) + 8 CN- + O2(aq) + 2 H2O => 4 AuCNCN- + 4 OH-
nodes.label: 1: 4 Au(s) + 8 CN- + O2(aq) + 2 H2O => 4 AuCNCN- + 4 OH-

settings.name: formula
settings.value: 4 Au(s) + 8 CN- + O2(aq) + 2 H2O => 4 AuCNCN- + 4 OH-

settings.name: constraintExpression
settings.value: V0_gas*(2*re2.c_O2_gas - 2*re2.c0_O2_gas) + V_liquid*(2*re.c_O2_aq + re.c_H2O + re.c_OH_1m - 2*re.c0_O2_aq - re.c0_H2O - re.c0_OH_1m)

settings.description: Surface rate of dissolution, Eq. 32 in Senanayake 2005
settings.name: Rs2_Au

settings.description: Transient total surface area of gold spheres
settings.name: spherical_S

settings.description: Volumetric rate of dissolution, modulated by remaining surface area
settings.name: spherical_R_Au

settings.name: formula
settings.value: 4 Au(s) + 8 CN- + O2(aq) + 2 H2O => 4 AuCNCN- + 4 OH-

settings.name: constraintExpression
settings.value: V0_gas*(2*re4.c_O2_gas - 2*re4.c0_O2_gas) + V_liquid*(2*re3.c_O2_aq + re3.c_H2O + re3.c_OH_1m - 2*re3.c0_O2_aq - re3.c0_H2O - re3.c0_OH_1m)
